subject: statistics
title: Measures of Spread
contentHtml:
Measures of spread are used to quantify the amount of variation or dispersion in a dataset.

  • Variance and standard deviation measure the average squared distance from the mean, while interquartile range (IQR) measures the difference between the first and third quartiles.
  • The range is simply the difference between the maximum and minimum values. Mean absolute deviation (MAD) is another way to calculate the average distance from the mean.

subject: statistics
title: Measures of Spread: Variance and Standard Deviation
contentHtml:
Variance and standard deviation are two fundamental measures of spread in descriptive statistics.

They quantify how spread out a dataset is from its mean value.
name: Variance Formula" },
intuition: These measures help us understand how much individual data points deviate from the average. Variance is sensitive to outliers, while standard deviation provides a more robust measure.
realWorldApplications: In machine learning, variance and standard deviation are used in algorithms like k-means clustering and Gaussian mixture models.

subject: statistics
title: Measures of Spread
contentHtml:
Measures of spread quantify the amount of variation in a dataset.

  • Variance and standard deviation describe how individual data points deviate from the mean.
  • IQR, range, and MAD provide alternative measures of spread that are less sensitive to outliers.
  • The coefficient of variation is useful for comparing spread across different datasets or variables.
name: Variance formula
problemHtml: Find the variance of exam scores with mean 80 and standard deviations 3, 4, and 2.
steps: [ {"stepNumber": 1, "description": "Calculate the squared differences from the mean", "mathHtml": "\[ (x_i - 80)^2 \]", "explanation": "This is the numerator of the variance formula" }, {"stepNumber": 2, "description": "Weight each squared difference by its frequency", "mathHtml": "\[ \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^n (x_i - 80)^2 \]", "explanation": "This is the sample variance formula" } ],
intuition: Measures of spread help you understand how individual data points deviate from the mean, making it easier to identify outliers and patterns.
